document_data.caption: A retort.
document_data.name: Retort
document_data.mainbody: '''Retorts''' were scientific items in the Realms often used by [[wizard]]s to distill liquids.
document_data.Description: A retort consisted of a basin with a tube attached to the top that ran diagonally downward.
document_data.Availability: ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold retorts, ranging in price from 1 [[silver piece]] to 5 [[gold piece]]s depending on the size.
